targets.expr: max by (instance)(sum by(view, instance) (jmix_ui_views_seconds_max{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view!~".*Fragment", lifeCycle=~"beforeShow|create|init|inject|load|ready"}))
max by (instance)(sum by(view, instance) (jmix_ui_views_seconds_max{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view!~".*Fragment", lifeCycle=~"afterClose|beforeClose"}))

sum by (view) (rate(jmix_ui_views_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view!~".*Fragment", lifeCycle=~"beforeShow|create|init|inject|load|ready"}[5m]))/sum by (view) (rate(jmix_ui_views_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="beforeShow", view!~".*Fragment"}[5m]))

sum by (view) (rate(jmix_ui_views_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view!~".*Fragment", lifeCycle=~"afterClose|beforeClose"}[5m]))/sum by (view) (rate(jmix_ui_views_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="beforeClose", view!~".*Fragment"}[5m]))
max by (view)(sum by(view,instance) (jmix_ui_views_seconds_max{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view!~".*Fragment", lifeCycle=~"afterClose|beforeClose"}))

sum by (view, dataLoader)(rate(jmix_ui_data_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="load"}[5m]))/sum by (view, dataLoader)(rate(jmix_ui_data_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="load"}[5m]))

sum by (view) (rate(jmix_ui_views_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view="$view"}[5m]))/sum by(view) (rate(jmix_ui_views_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="beforeShow", view="$view"}[5m]))

sum by(lifeCycle)(rate(jmix_ui_views_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view="$view"}[5m]))/ sum by (lifeCycle)(rate(jmix_ui_views_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view="$view"}[5m]))

sum by (dataLoader, lifeCycle)(rate(jmix_ui_data_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view="$view"}[5m]))/sum by (dataLoader, lifeCycle)(rate(jmix_ui_data_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", view="$view"}[5m]))
